description:
Presenting this fabulous, stylish property that is certain to please those discerning buyers looking for the perfect home to enable a bayside, carefree & peaceful existence. Situated in one of Scarborough's most sought after lifestyle localities, with Moreton Bay and a plethora of amenities only a short stroll away.

This stunning north facing home has been loved and immaculately cared for inside and out, and with all the creature comforts for you to enjoy. The floorplan is perfect for those who appreciate size, space and functionality with easy flow living throughout.

The large kitchen provides an abundance of cabinetry & bench space and is fitted with stainless steel appliances. Take advantage of the open plan design that encompasses the dining and family rooms extending onto the large, enclosed alfresco and out to the glistening pool and courtyard. This is where you will enjoy many hours of making lots of wonderful memories entertaining family and friends.

The clever house design boasts full privacy for all 4 bedrooms, office and service areas, all are generous in size and offer robes and storage to each. The master is extra generous with W.I.R., ensuite with double sinks and direct access to the outdoor area.

With a completely low-maintenance outlook, this home has been designed for those who enjoy making the most of their spare time. With the option of "lock and leave" travelling short or extended periods is no problem as this home takes care of itself.

The original owners have loved living in their home but it is now time for them to move on. There is simply not a thing to do to this outstanding offering, just move-in, un-pack, put your feet up and enjoy your new home and the lifestyle it brings. Inspections are highly recommended in order to appreciate what is being offered.

-A stunning home with perfect presentation
-350m to beautiful Moreton Bay waters
-Situated in a quiet tree-lined street
-Stunning open plan living spaces
-Large family size kitchen with an abundance of storage
-Separate casual and formal living areas
-Huge outdoor entertaining area
-4 built-in bedrooms
-Master with ensuite & W.I.R.
-Separate office or 5th Bedroom
-Glistening pool for summer dips
-Plantation shutters
-Ducted air-conditioning throughout
-Energy efficient fans & lights
-Solar hot water & solar panels with bird proofing
-Full ceiling insulation
-Large double garage with internal access

ABOUT THE LOCATION:-
• 500m Scarborough Bowls Club
• 600m Schools: Southern Cross Catholic College & Australia Trade School
• 700m Scarborough Waterfront (The Blue Park / Endeavour Park)
• 1km Scarborough Marina
• 1.2km Scarborough Village (Restaurants/cafes)
• 1.2km Moreton Bay Boat Club, Morgan's Seafood Market & Tempest Seafood Restaurant, Scarborough Brewery Co.
• 1.4km Scarborough Marina Boat Ramp
• 1.5km Scarborough Beach & Pirates Park & Dog Beach
• 3km to major shopping centre
• 3.3km to Kippa-ring Train Station







Whilst all care is taken, all measurements are approximate
